text: Wyscig pokoju – Warszawa-Berlin-Praga is a Polish-East German film based on the Peace Race. It was released in 1952. ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:East German films Category:Polish-language films Category:Polish documentary films Category:Documentary films about cycling Category:Documentary films about Poland Category:Documentary films about Germany Category:1952 documentary films Category:Polish films
